attributes.action: produce a national training requirement for all security officers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment we have the SIA 4 day course thats is frankly a joke!

it needs to be reformed, the training needs to be more in depth and of a higher standard. they also need the power to do there job's. in no way close to the police. review this industry talk to the guards and officers, it's a shambles.
